ModMetaData.name: Mortar Accuracy
ModMetaData.author: Hob Took
ModMetaData.description:
Instead of mortars having a fixed spread radius of 13 tiles and having a miss chance due to cover, the cover miss chance is removed and a colonist's Intellectual and/or Shooting skill will affect a mortar's accuracy.
By default, a colonist with maximum skill will improve a mortar's accuracy to 75%. A colonist with no skill will affect a mortar's accuracy by -40%. These values can be changed in Mod Settings (can set everyone's accuracy to perfect 100% accuracy if desired)
This affects all mortar shots, including enemy mortars.
Supports other mods: [WD] Expanded Artillery: mortars and cannons accuracy is affected by this mod More Vanilla Turrets: rocket and charge blast turret accuracy is affected by this mod
Load order does not matter to affect either of these mods.
